name: 56 Red Balloons
description:
56 Red Balloons

This game is a submission for  a Game Design and Development lecture held at the Technical University of Graz. The task was to take a Minimal Classic Game and make it juicy without changing the core game mechanics. Feel free to check out my take on this juciness-task.

Created by

Irena Ruprecht

How it works

Your goal is to shoot all 56 Red Balloons before one of them touches your jet pilot.

Controls

  • Move your jet pilot with [a] and [d] keys,  alternatively use the arrow keys [🠔] [🠖].
  • Fire with [space].

Credits

Music : bensound.com

Sound Effects : freesound.org

Art : opengameart.org

Fonts: 1001freefonts.com
